content: I'm trying to compile the current nightly archive and my existing Cargo 1.55 is very unhappy about all of the edition2021 stuff going on. It would like me to add cargo-features = ["edition2021"] line to a bunch of Cargo.toml files. Is there a better way to get the nightly code to build properly?
@Chris Wailes the compiler is bootstrapped with the previous release, so 1.57-nightly requires 1.56-beta and 1.56 requires 1.55
Ahh, it appears I may have made incorrect assumptions about the archives. So the nightly archive is for the 1.57 series and the beta branch is 1.56?
(Sorry, still getting used to Zulip so I read your messages out of order.)
Not sure which nightly archive you're specifically referring to, but yes.
